extendedInfo.description: If you are Asking Alexandria's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Asking Alexandria's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Asking Alexandria's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Asking Alexandria's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Stand Up And Scream- Reckless And Relentless************************List of lyrics ************************- A Candlelit Dinner With Inamorta- A Lesson Never Learned- A Prophecy- A Single Moment Of Sincerity- Alerion- Another Bottle Down- Breathless- Closure- Dear Insanity- Dedication- Final Episode (Let's Change The Channel)- Hey There, Mr. Brooks!- I Used To Have A Best Friend (But Then He Gave Me An STD)- I Was Once, Possibly, Maybe, Perhaps A Cowboy King- If You Can't Ride Two Horses At Once...Then You Should Get Out Of The Circus- Morte Et Dabo- Nobody Don't Dance No More- Not The American Average- Reckless And Relentless- Run Free- Someone, Somewhere- The Match- To The Stage- Welcome- When Everyday's The Weekend- The Death Of Me

reviews.title: AA
reviews.comment: Awesome app. But some older songs are missing. I hope this app will be updated with lyrics from From death to Destiny album. Lookin\' forward to itt! ^^
reviews.author: Zorana Ilic

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Well I thought it was good until I discovered it don\'t have all the songs
reviews.author: Devin Tucker

reviews.title: Good but..
reviews.comment: I would have liked to see some of their older songs in here. Like, Bite Your Lip and Fake It, The Irony of Your Perfection, Still a great app, keep it up!
reviews.author: Kyle Vaughn
